0010001101100011 0010111001011101 0 -> sum: 0101000111000000, cout: 0

1111001100101011 0110000110100100 0 -> sum: 0101010011001111, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
